knimeNode.name: Gradient Boosted Trees to PMML
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a Gradient Boosted Trees model to PMML.

fullDescription.intro: Writes a Gradient Boosted Trees model to PMML. Models learned on bit-, byte- or double-vector columns can be translated but the node will show a warning that the models can't be read in the corresponding PMML Predictor node.

ports.inPort: The Gradient Boosted Trees model that should be written to PMML
ports.outPort: The PMML containing the Gradient Boosted Trees model
